TheWord.Title: Oh LORD I thank You for all the things You have done. Oh LORD I thank You for this beautiful moment in history.

BibleWord.Commentary: So He drove out the man; and He placed at the east of the garden of Eden Cherubims, and a flaming sword which turned every way, to keep the way of the tree of life (Genesis 3:24). He brought in the priests and the Levites, and gathered them together into the east street (2 Chronicles 29:4).

AlphabetSequence.Word: Oh LORD I thank You for all the things You have done. Oh LORD I thank You for this beautiful moment in history.
